**User:**
I'm curious about creating currencies on Verus. Can I create a currency without having an ID of the same name?

**AI Assistant:**
No, to create a currency of a specific name, you need an ID of the same name. The controller of this ID is the only one who can create a currency of that name, and they can only do so once.

That makes sense. What about multiple people creating a currency with the same name? Is that possible?

**AI Assistant:**
No, only the controller of an ID can create a currency of the same name, and they can only do so once. This means that multiple people cannot create a currency with the same name.

No, with an ID, you can only create one currency of the same name. Once you've created a currency with an ID, you cannot create another currency with the same ID.
